DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the effect of a specific mineral water on serum lipid concentrations in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Mineral Water Consumption on Serum Lipid Parameters
DOC.criteria: Healthy as based on medical history and physical examination Fasting serum LDL cholesterol > 100 and/or fasting serum triglyceride > 100 Willing to drink mineral water for 12 weeks Willing not to serve as blood donor during the study Informed consent signed Female subjects who are pregnant or nursing a child Participation in any clinical trial up to 90 days before Day 01 of this study Renal or hepatic dysfunction Heart disease
